faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get your questions about AutomateFlow answered

q1.question: How does the free trial work?
q1.answer: You have 7 days to test all platform features without commitment. No credit card required to start.

q2.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q2.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time without fines or additional fees.

q3.question: Do the agents work in English?
q3.answer: Yes! Our agents are native in English, Portuguese and Spanish, with support for over 50 languages.

q4.question: How do I integrate with WhatsApp?
q4.answer: Integration is simple and takes less than 5 minutes. Just scan a QR code and your agent will be ready.

q5.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
q5.answer: No! Our platform was designed to be intuitive. Anyone can set up an agent in minutes.

q6.question: What happens if I exceed the message limit?
q6.answer: You will be notified when you are close to the limit and can upgrade your plan at any time.

q7.question: Is customer data secure?
q7.answer: Yes! We use end-to-end encryption and follow all data protection regulations.

q8.question: Can I customize agent responses?
q8.answer: Absolutely! You have full control over tone of voice, default responses and agent behavior.
